graph_title: (a) 국회의 여성 의석 비율 (b) 지방정부의 여성 의석 비율
indicator_definition: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
indicator_name: (a) 국회의 여성 의석 비율 (b) 지방정부의 여성 의석 비율
target_name: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
